cards.title: Mystic Feline
cards.description: A mysterious cat with extraordinary powers. When this card is summoned, all opponents must pet it immediately or lose 500 life points.

cards.title: Loaf Master
cards.description: This cat has mastered the ancient art of loafing. Its perfect bread-like form grants it immunity to all vacuum cleaner attacks.

cards.title: Void Gazer
cards.description: Stares into the void at 3 AM. When this card attacks, your opponent must explain what they're doing up so late.

cards.title: Chonky Overlord
cards.description: An absolute unit. This card cannot be destroyed by diet-related card effects. Gains 500 ATK for each treat in your hand.

cards.title: Sleepy Sage
cards.description: Sleeps 23 hours a day. During your opponent's turn, this card cannot be targeted because it's napping.

cards.title: Zoomie Demon
cards.description: Gets the zoomies at exactly 2 AM. This card can attack twice per turn but must run in random directions.

cards.title: Box Dweller
cards.description: If it fits, it sits. This card gains 1000 DEF when placed in Defense Position inside a cardboard box.

cards.title: Judgmental Floof
cards.description: Silently judges all your life choices. Your opponent must discard 1 card while making eye contact with this card.

cards.title: Keyboard Warrior
cards.description: Sits on your keyboard during important meetings. This card prevents your opponent from activating Spell Cards.

cards.title: Liquid Cat
cards.description: Cats are liquid. This card can fit into any container regardless of size. Cannot be destroyed by physical attacks.

cards.title: Toe Bean Assassin
cards.description: Silent but deadly. When this card attacks directly, your opponent must acknowledge how cute its toe beans are.

cards.title: Derp Knight
cards.description: Not a single thought behind those eyes. This card is immune to mind-control effects because there's nothing to control.

cards.title: Blep Mage
cards.description: Forgot to put its tongue back in. When summoned, all players must say 'blep' or take 300 damage.

cards.title: Grumpy Guardian
cards.description: Permanently annoyed at everything. This card gains 500 ATK for each card your opponent plays because it's just more stuff to be mad about.

cards.title: Biscuit Baker
cards.description: Makes biscuits on your lap at 5 AM. When this card is in Attack Position, it kneads your life points back by 500.

cards.title: Ceiling Cat
cards.description: Watches you from above. This card cannot be targeted by card effects because it's in the ceiling watching you.

cards.title: Purr Engine
cards.description: Purrs so loud it vibrates the entire house. All Beast-Type monsters gain 300 ATK from the good vibes.

cards.title: Majestic Fluffball
cards.description: The fluffiest of all cats. This card requires 3 tributes to summon but is worth it because look at all that fluff.

cards.title: Sassy Striker
cards.description: Knocks things off tables for fun. Once per turn, you can destroy 1 card on your opponent's field by pushing it off.

cards.title: Nap Champion
cards.description: Professional sleeper. This card is always in Defense Position and cannot change its battle position.

cards.title: Chaos Goblin
cards.description: Pure chaos energy. At the start of each turn, flip a coin. If heads, this card attacks. If tails, it knocks over your water glass.

cards.title: Tiny Terror
cards.description: Smol but fierce. Despite its low stats, this card can attack monsters with 2000 or more ATK and win through sheer audacity.

cards.title: Elegant Noble
cards.description: Too fancy for your peasant food. This card can only be summoned if you control no other monsters because it demands to be the center of attention.

cards.title: Blanket Thief
cards.description: Steals all the blankets at night. When this card is summoned, your opponent must give you 1 card from their hand (the blanket).

cards.title: Sunbeam Seeker
cards.description: Follows the sunbeam around the house all day. This card gains 200 ATK during your opponent's turn because it found the perfect sunny spot.

cards.title: Screamy Boi
cards.description: Yells at nothing at 4 AM. When this card is summoned, both players must cover their ears or take 400 damage.

cards.title: Paw Patrol
cards.description: Patrols the house at night making sure everything is secure. This card can attack your opponent directly if they're not in bed by midnight.

cards.title: Treat Goblin
cards.description: Will do anything for treats. You can discard 1 card (a treat) to have this card attack twice during your Battle Phase.

cards.title: Wise Whiskers
cards.description: Ancient and all-knowing. This card knows exactly when you're about to feed it, even if you're trying to be sneaky. Cannot be fooled by fake-out feeding motions.

cards.title: Mischief Maker
cards.description: Up to no good. Once per turn, you can activate 1 Trap Card from your hand during your opponent's turn because this cat doesn't follow the rules.

cards.title: Snuggle Buddy
cards.description: The ultimate companion. This card cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects. When your life points would become 0, this card purrs and restores them to 100 instead.
